quote: I slipped my hand into hers. A strange and unfamiliar feeling ran through me. It felt like the ocean, like sunlight, like horses. Like love. I searched my mind and found the name for it. Joy.
quote_letters: I SLIPPED MY HAND INTO HERS A STRANGE AND UNFAMILIAR FEELING RAN THROUGH ME IT FELT LIKE THE OCEAN LIKE SUNLIGHT LIKE HORSES LIKE LOVE I SEARCHED MY MIND AND FOUND THE NAME FOR IT JOY
